Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 5 selections
Armor Of Shadows: May cast self Mage Armor at will
Bewitching Whispers: May use a Warlock spell slot to cast Compulsion 1/long rest
Eldritch Spear: Increases Eldritch Blast range to 300'
Mask Of Many Faces: May cast Disguise Self at will
Misty Visions: May cast Silent Image at will
Pact Of The Chain: May cast Find Familiar as a ritual
Whispers Of The Grave: May cast Speak With Dead at will
